data.message: I'm against gay marriage but I really don't want to think about it on FB and what makes it worse is that FB is posting something about it shame on you Facebook

replies.message: This should not be new to anyone.  The owner is openly an atheist who is all for equality...yet you continue to use it.
wow we are going where no man has gone before
